subject: p15204620
Impression: AP chest compared to, 6:33 pm: There is no pneumothorax. Small-to-moderate right pleural effusion is stable. There is more consolidation in the right lung outside the entirely consolidated right middle lobe, and suggestion of new consolidation at the base of the left lung which might be due to spillover pneumonia originating in the obstructed right middle lobe. Extensive mediastinal and right hilar adenopathy unchanged. No left pleural effusion. No cardiomegaly.
